summary: Not necessarily arguing with that last reblog of yours, but I think the frustration is that Imane seems almost like she is...
question: Not necessarily arguing with that last reblog of yours, but I think the frustration is that Imane seems almost like she is blaming her friends and Lucas wasn't. Not invalidating either of their struggles, but Imane also has a lot of support structures in place for her to talk to that Lucas didn't.
answer:
again, there are no easy answers. I’d say the girl squad (as a group) are being worse friends to Imane in her time of need than the boys ever were to Lucas. I don’t have many solidified thoughts on this yet. I guess their situations are very different, because the things isolating/separating Imane from her friends are not secret. she is obviously and openly different, but those differences are parts of her life that she finds pride in and happiness in. but her friends don’t understand or relate to them.

Lucas was scared to show the group who he really was, but when he confided in them, they accepted him no questions asked. everything he had in common with them before, he still does now. he just has a hot boyfriend instead of a hot girlfriend.  Imane is already pretty open with her friends about who she is… only they don’t seem to be interested in it. and after all these months of being friends, they’re still asking dumb stuff about Islam, her culture, her lifestyle. I can’t blame her for not being fully honest with them about her feelings, because quite possibly from her perspective, she gets better understanding and advice from Idriss, from her family, and from her other Muslim friends.

TLDR: i think Imane has more reason to blame her friends right now than Lucas did, and although both their issues were with not telling their friendship groups the full story, Lucas was acting out of a (luckily for him) mostly unfounded fear of being ostracized,  whereas as Imane has seen time and time again the girl group don’t understand her and havent ever made the effort. she already IS ostracized

sorry, this answer was a rambling mess

summary: It bothers me that people are mad at Manon? Like, first, she's in a shitty relationship with Charles and she gets herself out of...
question: It bothers me that people are mad at Manon? Like, first, she's in a shitty relationship with Charles and she gets herself out of it, and now she thinks she's found a sweet guy, and people are hating on her for kissing him! It makes me so mad! We are seeing everything from Imane's perspective, but her not speaking up about her feelings isn't Manon's fault!
answer:
It’s such a tricky scenario. how much of Imane’s feelings for Sofiane is she aware of? Manon deserves nothing but sympathy for the situation with Charles. If she is finding solace in Sofiane (who clearly also was pretty bummed out by Imane’s rejection) then that’s her right. as long as she’s not doing it with the specific knowledge of how much it’s hurting Imane and yet pursuing the relationship anyway.

however, in the long run, it can’t end well. I don’t buy Sofiane feeling that strongly about Imane and then moving on so fast. he surely can’t provide the real comfort/distraction that Manon is looking for because his head/heart are elsewhere

summary: Top five songs used in any skam! (including og)
question: Top five songs used in any skam! (including og)
answer:
I’m gonna go based on the scenes as well (not just my enjoyment of the songs) to make it easier (and I’ll only use 1 per show so I don’t just list every evak song lol)

1. O helga natt by niels bech (og)- do I really need to explain?

2. Last dance by scratch massive (france)- The editing of this whole scene deserves all the awards

3. Trampoline by Shaed (druck)- another one that mostly has to do with the editing, it fit so perfectly with the scene and the song slaps so hard

4. Myth by beach house (italia)- this song was so perfect for the atmosphere of this scene I really couldn’t think of a better song to use, plus it slaps as well

5. Oh baby by lcd soundsystem (nl)- name a more iconic opening sequence, I’ll wait (also nl has the best music use overall in my opinion, they just do everything so fucking well ugh their minds)

summary: 100% agree with your Sofiane post. And as much as it's a dick move I can understand why he'd go out with Manon. I don't think...
question: 100% agree with your Sofiane post. And as much as it's a dick move I can understand why he'd go out with Manon. I don't think there was malicious intent. She was... there. And available. Imane wasn't. And she's also trying to move on from a broken heart. And he probably likes her? Not romantically, but they'd talked a few times, they obviously get on. If he really wants to move on (and why wouldn't he?) then it makes sense to try with someone he actually likes, rather than with a total stranger.

reblog.comment: yeah…I mean…it’s not that hard lol

trail.content_raw: yeah…I mean…it’s not that hard lol
trail.content: yeah…I mean…it’s not that hard lol

blog.title: Axel Auriant Stans Only
blog.description: I don’t even know what this blog is but my current hyperfixation is skam and all the remakes so take that as you will

question: top 5 elu moments ❤️
answer:
!!!! only 5 ???!!!!

1. The first kiss- poetic cinema at its finest, I still can’t get over the utter beauty of that scene 

2. Minute by minute- it was such a wonderful conversation and I loved how Eliott got to talk about his MI in his own words and was allowed to be vulnerable in a way we hadn’t totally seen before 

3. Samedi 9h17- Another scene I will never be over… the tenderness jumped out and they really built the foundation of their relationship in this clip

4. LUCAS JE T’AIME- need I say more?

5. I’ve gotta go with the paint scene- (honestly this is purely from a technical standpoint) because the lighting! the paint! the music! Everything about this scene is the reason I want to go into the film/tv industry, it takes my breath away every single time I watch and rewatch

blog.name: luneaurose
blog.title: 🕊🏹📜
blog.description: ♡ 𝑜𝑟𝑖𝑎𝑛𝑒 ♡

question: Top 5 Elu AU head canons???
answer:
☁️ Eliott loves playing with Lucas’s hair. If they’re close enough, he tries to be constantly touching it. He’s always pushing Lucas’s hair up and away from his eyes, especially when they’re laying in bed. He loves massaging Lucas’s head until he falls asleep. Eliott loves having his hands in Lucas’s hair.

☁️ The boys love to stay in when it’s raining and make a day of it. If they’re at Lucas’s everyone eventually just leaves them alone because it’s not like they’re paying attention to them anyway and if they’re at Eliott’s they turn the living room into the coziest thing you’ve ever seen in your life ♡

☁️ Eliott loves dragging Lucas into restaurants with really strange food (to lucas) and making him try the weirdest things he can find because he knows Lucas lowkey enjoys it even though he pretends to be grumpy for like 99% of time before he ends up eating it anyway (and liking it)

☁️ The day Eliott found out the name of the song Lucas played for him on their first date his eyes teared up and he ended up asking Lucas to teach him how to play it. Rumor has it he’s still not even halfway through the song or playing it properly.

☁️ Eliott asked Lucas to move in with him after being together for a year, since half of the boy’s things were already in his apartment anyway. It only took two days for him to get settled in completely, and that’s because it was raining ♡

blog.name: carmillasheridan
blog.title: The other side of the moon
blog.description: Lizzie. Disaster bi .🇫🇷 Anything that I like. I have more fandoms that I can count

summary: Eliott learning that Lucas used to have strong feelings for Yann. I mean, we all saw how he was with Chloe, so imagine him...
body:
You know what I can’t stop thinking about?

Eliott learning that Lucas used to have strong feelings for Yann. I mean, we all saw how he was with Chloe, so imagine him learning that, going through all of Lucas’ instagram’s posts and be like :

Then he jumps on Lucas when they’re alone, kiss him passionately and then they talk it out and realize their experiences were actually very similar and it makes them giggle like children and look fondly at one another. Then they cuddle all night and whisper sweet, reassuring words to one another.

blog.name: ao3feed-elu
blog.title: the latest lucas/eliott fics
blog.description:
This is an automatic feed using RSS to post the newest fics from AO3 Lucas/Eliott from Skam France, on your dash.

If not stated otherwise, this is not a rec tumblr. ALT ER LOVE

title: Home is where I am
description:
by MeOnly

The story of Maxence and Axel, how they met and fell in love, as it should be. But also the story of finding yourself, as you need to do.

This is also the story about how Skam France season 3 came to life, and you will for sure recognize fun facts from the casts interviews, Instagram updates, twitter and Skam France - projections!

This is real life fiction, do not read if you do not approve!

This is still just fiction. Let’s have some fun!

Words: 2688, Chapters: 6/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: SKAM (France)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Maxence Danet Fauvel, Axel Auriant-Blot, Eliott Demaury, Lucas Lallemant, Davis Hourregue, Niels Rahou
  • Relationships: Axel Auriant-Blot/Maxence Danet Fauvel, Eliott Demaury/Lucas Lallemant
  • Additional Tags: In real life - fic
